name: Hero's Challenge
description:
Roguelike game.

Defeat the Devil on the 200th floor.


- About 'Purchase full version'
When you touch 'Purchase full version' button on title screen.
you will go to 'Birth of Hero' sales page in the App Store.
If you want to purchase 'Birth of Hero',
Just follow the app store purchase process.

- Caution
'Birth of Hero' is a Upbringing simulation game, not a Roguelike game.
There are scenarios, but there are no more items, enemies, and stages.
Of course, 'Birth of Hero' includes 'Hero's challenge'(no ads).
